description: Only the children of those "critical to the island's Covid-19 response" will still be able to attend.
title: Coronavirus: IOM schools to close for most pupils, government says
title_page: Coronavirus: IOM schools to close for most pupils, government says - BBC News
maintext: Only the children of those "critical to the island's coronavirus response" will then be able to attend, Chief Minister Howard Quayle said as the number of positive cases rose by three to five.
